title: Lecker Essen - Food Stall
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, European, Austrian, Take-out only
description: Austrian-run market stand located at Bremen University two days a week -- send HappyCow specific days/location. Offers vegetarian and vegan food. Sample items might be cauliflower salad, soup, cevapcici kebabs, chickpea burger. No longer at Achim Saturday Street Market as of May 2015.
